snippet.title: Your Financial Story Trailer (Game Release Trailer)
snippet.description:
Available on MacOS, Windows, Linux
https://brogan-m-pratt.itch.io/yourfinancialstory

Take control of your personal finances through game-based learning! Your Financial Story is a hand drawn, visual-novel personal finance simulation game for young adults that teaches financial literacy skills in an intuitive, evidence based way. 

Write your own financial story from leaving home, choosing a career, and adapting to real life situations as you learn how to budget along the way.

More info at www.yourfinancialstory.info

Music: Tape Star by Shane Ivers - https://www.silvermansound.com
Music: VHS Dreams by Shane Ivers - https://www.silvermansound.com
